channel.title: Populus Trichocarpa on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Populus Trichocarpa on funPlantGenes

item.title: LOG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.009G010800 Gene Symbol: LOG1 Gene Name: LONELY GUY 1 Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Description: The phenotype was caused by a poplar homolog of LONELY GUY 1 (LOG1), which encodes an enzyme in cytokinin biosynthesis and significantly increased xylem proliferation.

item.title: PdGNC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G229200 Gene Symbol: PdGNC Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: The GATA transcription factor GNC (PdGNC) plays an important role in photosynthesis and growth in poplar.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri007G050600 Gene Symbol: PotriNRAMP3.1 Gene Name: Genome: P.

item.title: PotriNRAMP3.2

item.title: PtCBL10A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G035400.1 Gene Symbol: PtCBL10A Gene Name: calcineurin B-like protein10 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Poplar calcineurin B-like proteins PtCBL10A and PtCBL10B regulate shoot salt tolerance through interaction with PtSOS2 in the vacuolar membrane.

item.title: PtCBL10B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G230200.1 Gene Symbol: PtCBL10B Gene Name: calcineurin B-like protein10 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Poplar calcineurin B-like proteins PtCBL10A and PtCBL10B regulate shoot salt tolerance through interaction with PtSOS2 in the vacuolar membrane.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.002G105600 Gene Symbol: PtDAM1 Gene Name: Genome: PopGenIE database:(https://popgenie.

item.title: PtNIT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.004G199600 Gene Symbol: PtNIT1 Gene Name: nitrilase1 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: The nitrilase PtNIT1 catabolizes herbivore-induced nitriles in Populus trichocarpa.

item.title: PtoNGAL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G208100 Gene Symbol: PtoNGAL Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa reference genome v3.

item.title: PtoYAB11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.016G067300 Gene Symbol: PtoYAB11 Gene Name: YABBY11 Genome: Populus trichocarpa reference genome v3.

item.title: PtrBBX23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.011G105400.1 Gene Symbol: PtrBBX23 Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Description: Overexpression of BBX23 in poplar activated expression of MYB TFs and structural genes in the flavonoid pathway, thereby promoting the accumulation of proanthocyanidins and anthocyanins.

item.title: PtrbHLH186
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.018G083700 Gene Symbol: PtrbHLH186 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Overexpressing PtrbHLH186 in Populus trichocarpa resulted in retarded plant growth, increased guaiacyl lignin, a higher proportion of smaller stem vessels and strong drought-tolerant phenotypes.

item.title: PtrCesA4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.002G257900 Gene Symbol: PtrCesA4 Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Description: Together with polysaccharide immunolocalization data, these findings suggest differences in the role of SCW PtrCesAs-synthesized cellulose in wood and phloem fibre wall structures.

item.title: PtrCesA7A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G181900 Gene Symbol: PtrCesA7A Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Description: Together with polysaccharide immunolocalization data, these findings suggest differences in the role of SCW PtrCesAs-synthesized cellulose in wood and phloem fibre wall structures.

item.title: PtrCesA7B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.018G103900 Gene Symbol: PtrCesA7B Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Description: Together with polysaccharide immunolocalization data, these findings suggest differences in the role of SCW PtrCesAs-synthesized cellulose in wood and phloem fibre wall structures.

item.title: PtrCesA8A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.011G069600 Gene Symbol: PtrCesA8A Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Description: Together with polysaccharide immunolocalization data, these findings suggest differences in the role of SCW PtrCesAs-synthesized cellulose in wood and phloem fibre wall structures.

item.title: PtrCesA8B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.004G059600 Gene Symbol: PtrCesA8B Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Description: Together with polysaccharide immunolocalization data, these findings suggest differences in the role of SCW PtrCesAs-synthesized cellulose in wood and phloem fibre wall structures.

item.title: PtrDIV4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.009G042600.1 Gene Symbol: PtrDIV4 Gene Name: PtrDIV4 Genome: Phytozome: Populus trichocarpa v3.

item.title: PtrDRIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.007G132700.1 Gene Symbol: PtrDRIF1 Gene Name: DIVARICATA AND RADIALIS INTERACTING FACTOR 1 Genome: Phytozome: Populus trichocarpa v3.

item.title: PtrMAN6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtrMAN6 Gene Name: Populus endo-1,4-Î²-mannanase Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Populus endo-beta-mannanase PtrMAN6 plays a role in coordinating cell wall remodeling with suppression of secondary wall thickening through generation of oligosaccharide signals.

item.title: PtrMYB074
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.015G082700 Gene Symbol: PtrMYB074 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Dimerization of PtrMYB074 and PtrWRKY19 mediates transcriptional activation of PtrbHLH186 for secondary xylem development in Populus trichocarpa.

item.title: PtrMYB221
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.004G174400.1 Gene Symbol: PtrMYB221 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 221 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Wood forming tissue-specific bicistronic expression of PdGA20ox1 and PtrMYB221 improves both the quality and quantity of woody biomass production in a hybrid poplar.

item.title: PtrNAC029
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.002G182400 Gene Symbol: PtrNAC029 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor-like 9 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: The miR6445-NAC029 module regulates drought tolerance by regulating the expression of glutathione S-transferase U23 and reactive oxygen species scavenging in Populus.

item.title: PtrRAD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.002G260000 Gene Symbol: PtrRAD1 Gene Name: RADIALIS Genome: Phytozome: Populus trichocarpa v3.

item.title: PtrVCS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.004G126600 Gene Symbol: PtrVCS2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: PtrVCS2, encoding a zinc finger protein.

item.title: PtRWA-C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G148500 Gene Symbol: PtRWA-C Gene Name: Genome: P.

item.title: PtrWOX4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.014G025300 Gene Symbol: PtrWOX4a Gene Name: WUSCHEL-RELATED HOMEOBOX4 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Cell-type-specific PtrWOX4a and PtrVCS2 form a regulatory nexus with a histone modification system for stem cambium development in Populus trichocarpa.

item.title: PtrWOX4b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.002G124100 Gene Symbol: PtrWOX4b Gene Name: WUSCHEL-RELATED HOMEOBOX4 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: WUSCHEL-RELATED HOMEOBOX4 (WOX4)-like genes regulate cambial cell division activity and secondary growth in Populus trees.

item.title: PtrWRKY19
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.014G050000 Gene Symbol: PtrWRKY19 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Dimerization of PtrMYB074 and PtrWRKY19 mediates transcriptional activation of PtrbHLH186 for secondary xylem development in Populus trichocarpa.

item.title: PtrXB38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G070800.6 Gene Symbol: PtrXB38 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Expression quantitative trait loci mapping identified PtrXB38 as a key hub gene in adventitious root development in Populus.
